metadata.description: Hostname of the Cisco ISE instance.
Port number of Cisco ISE ERS API. By default 9060.

uiDefinition.description: Authentication type to connect to your API

properties.description: Cisco Identity Services Engine connector for on-premise gateway

info.title: Cisco ISE custom connector
info.description: Cisco Identity Services Engine connector for on-premise gateway

204.description: Indicates the REST API successfully carried out the desired action.

401.description: This indicates that the action was undertaken with wrong credentials, no credentials or the account is not authorized to perform this action.

500.description: Indicates an issue on the server side. Logs on ISE may help understand the cause.

put.summary: Assign an ANC policy to an endpoint

Update the group of an endpoint
